WebhostUK LTD specializes in offering Managed Joomla web hosting, with increased security delivering superfast performance for your Joomla website. Our services include Shared hosting, Managed Joomla Hosting, Reseller hosting, Managed VPS serves, Cloud VPS Serves, E-commerce Business hosting and Managed Dedicated Servers.
Joomla is one of the most widely used free and enjoyed Content Management ( CMS ) application tool on the web. Joomla is probably the most comprehensive, and "search engine friendly" CMS application tool that you can find. Joomla Hosting can be used to setup a small business or large corporate business site or simple personal web hosting without any licensing fees involved. No HTML or website development skills are required to run a Joomla CMS.

Once you signup with our Joomla hosting plan, our migration specialist team will offer you free data migration of unlimited number of accounts or data from your old hosting provider to our servers.

We offer 30 day money-back guarantee which means if you are not completely satisfied in the first 30 days you can have your money back.


Limited Offer : Get 10% discount with any of our Joomla hosting plan by using promo-code : JOOMLA10
